reviewText: A great book...It showed me the different aspects of pastels...I paint but I had no experience in pastels...This was very helpful...

If you are beginning to work w/pastels watching this video may not help much.  If you want to see something different from the rest this is the one.  Maxwell Wilks has his own style that is fun to watch.

Maxwell Wilks style of painting is very refre3shing.  He is very emotional when he paints and you know when he does something that really hits an emotional string with him.  If your art teacher has told you to loosen up in your painting than you need this video.
